data.title: Revenue of the RATP Group, by division 2021
data.meta_description: In 2021, the consolidated revenue from the RATP Group amounted to approximately 5.84 billion euros, a year-on-year increase of around six percent amid the COVID-19 pandemic.
data.text:
RATP Group: Consolidated revenue, by division 2020-2021

Published by Statista Research Department,
